description.narrative: Funding under this initiative delivered through the Asian Development bank (ADB) supports the LAO PDR National Integrated Water Resources Management Support Project (NIWRMSP), working with the Government of Lao PDR, via the Water Resources Environment Administration (WREA) and the National University of Laos (NUOL). The objective of this support is that by 2015 WREA will provide effective leadership in water resources decision-making, and for UNOL to be providing effective leadership in the provision of tertiary education for water resource management professionals. This will be achieved through 4 key outputs: 1) Building of national capacity in integrated water resources management; 2) The improvement of river basin management; 3) The preparation of a national groundwater management action plan; and 4) The strengthening of integrated water resources management education at the NUOL. The outcome of the support is to ensure sustainable water resources use and development, protection o
